name: Unreal Logic
description:
Unreal logic is a grid base puzzle game where the rules in the world are changeable. By manipulating the rules, you can change how the game works, repurpose things you find, and cause suprising interactions.

This is Jack, the character you originally control.
The main goal to win is to collect coins.

However these rules may change and at some point you may control another character!

This is an example of when you control another character

For more details on how to play please go to screenshots.

So what are you waiting for? Go and make the logic unreal!

To find the resources and the source code, go to the following link:

https://gitlab.com/raihansyah.dean/game-dev-game-jam
